FeatureName.title: Feature Name
FeatureName.description: The name of the feature flag being evaluated.

Enabled.title: Feature Enabled
Enabled.description: Whether the feature flag is evaluated as enabled.

Variant.title: Assigned Variant
Variant.description: The assigned variant during the feature evaluation.

VariantAssignmentReason.title: Variant Assignment Reason
VariantAssignmentReason.description: The reason why the variant is assigned during the feature evaluation.

TargetingId.title: Targeting Id
TargetingId.description: The targeting id used for the feature evaluation.

DefaultWhenEnabled.title: Default When Enabled
DefaultWhenEnabled.description: The default variant when the feature is enabled.

Version.title: Version
Version.description: The version of the feature evaluation event schema.

VariantAssignmentPercentage.title: Variant Assignment Percentage
VariantAssignmentPercentage.description: The percentage of users assigned to the variant that was assigned. This field is optional and only emitted when the assignment reason is DefaultWhenEnabled or Percentile.

AllocationId.title: Allocation Id
AllocationId.description: A unique identifier for the allocation of the feature flag. The value changes when any allocation of the flag changes.

ETag.title: ETag
ETag.description: The ETag of the feature flag.

FeatureFlagReference.title: Feature Flag Reference
FeatureFlagReference.description: The reference to the feature flag being evaluated. Example: https://{host}/kv/{feature_flag_key}.
